lessons.title: ChatGPT as an LLM
lessons.subtitle: What is ChatGPT and How Does It Work?
lessons.content:
Hey there, I'm Alex! Today, we're diving into the world of ChatGPT, an advanced large language model (LLM).

ChatGPT is an AI tool created by OpenAI that can understand and generate human-like text. Think of it as a super-smart writing assistant that can help you with almost anything ‚Äî from drafting emails to brainstorming ideas.

**How does it work?**

ChatGPT was trained on millions of texts from the internet, books, and articles. It learned patterns in language, which allows it to predict what words should come next in a sentence. When you type a message (called a "prompt"), ChatGPT reads it, understands the context, and generates a helpful response.

**Key things to know:**

‚Ä¢ ChatGPT doesn't actually "think" ‚Äî it predicts the most likely next words
‚Ä¢ The better your prompt, the better the response
‚Ä¢ It can make mistakes, so always double-check important information
‚Ä¢ It works best when you give it clear, specific instructions

Ready to try it out? Let's move to your first exercise!

exercises.scenario: Just finished an important meeting and need to write a follow-up letter. How would you ask AI for help?
exercises.promptTemplate: Can you help me write an email to a [___] about a recent meeting? Include product features.
exercises.aiResponse:
Subject: Follow-Up from Our Meeting

Dear [Client's Name],

Thank you for taking the time to meet with me on [date]. I enjoyed discussing how [Product Name] can help your team.

As discussed, here are the key features:
‚Ä¢ Automated workflow management
‚Ä¢ Real-time analytics dashboard
‚Ä¢ Team collaboration tools
‚Ä¢ 24/7 customer support

I'd love to schedule a follow-up to address any questions.

Best regards,
[Your Name]

lessons.title: Feed ChatGPT with Data
lessons.subtitle: How to Provide Context for Better Responses
lessons.content:
Now that you know what ChatGPT is, let's learn how to make it work even better for you!

The secret to getting great responses from ChatGPT is providing the right context. Think of it like giving instructions to a new employee ‚Äî the more details you provide, the better the result.

**Tips for feeding data to ChatGPT:**

1. **Be specific**: Instead of "Write me an email," say "Write a professional email to my boss requesting a day off next Friday."

2. **Provide examples**: Show ChatGPT what you want by including an example of the style or format you prefer.

3. **Set the role**: Tell ChatGPT who it should be. "Act as a marketing expert" or "You are a friendly teacher."

4. **Include constraints**: Mention word limits, tone, audience, or any specific requirements.

5. **Give context**: Share background information that helps ChatGPT understand your situation.

Let's practice this with an exercise!

lessons.title: ChatGPT for SMM
lessons.subtitle: Social Media Marketing with AI
lessons.content:
Social Media Marketing (SMM) is one of the most popular uses for ChatGPT. Whether you're a small business owner or a marketing professional, AI can supercharge your social media game.

**What ChatGPT can do for your social media:**

‚Ä¢ Write engaging captions for any platform
‚Ä¢ Generate content calendars and posting schedules
‚Ä¢ Create hashtag strategies
‚Ä¢ Draft responses to comments and messages
‚Ä¢ Brainstorm content ideas
‚Ä¢ Write ad copy

**Pro tip:** When asking ChatGPT for social media content, always specify:
- The platform (Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.)
- Your audience (age, interests, profession)
- The tone (professional, casual, funny, inspirational)
- Any calls-to-action you want to include

Let's practice creating social media content!

lessons.subtitle: Plan Your Perfect Trip with AI

Tell ChatGPT your destination, travel dates, budget, interests, and any special requirements (dietary needs, accessibility, traveling with kids, etc.).

lessons.title: Event Planning
lessons.subtitle: Organize Events Like a Pro with AI
lessons.content:
Planning an event can be stressful, but ChatGPT can handle the heavy lifting! From birthday parties to corporate events, AI can help you organize every detail.

**ChatGPT can help you with:**

‚Ä¢ Creating event timelines and checklists
‚Ä¢ Writing invitation copy

**Tips for event planning prompts:**
- Specify the type of event
- Include the number of guests
- Mention your budget
- Describe the vibe/theme you want
- Note any dietary restrictions or special needs

lessons.title: Prompt Engineering
lessons.subtitle: Master the Art of AI Prompting
lessons.content:
Congratulations on making it this far! Now let's learn the ultimate skill ‚Äî Prompt Engineering. This is the art of crafting the perfect instructions for AI.

**The CRISPE Framework:**

‚Ä¢ **C**apacity: What role should the AI play?
‚Ä¢ **R**equest: What do you want it to do?
‚Ä¢ **I**nstructions: Any specific guidelines?
‚Ä¢ **S**tyle: What tone or format?
‚Ä¢ **P**ersonalization: Who is the audience?
‚Ä¢ **E**xtras: Any additional requirements?

**Example of a great prompt:**
"You are an expert copywriter (Capacity). Write a product description (Request) that is under 100 words (Instructions) in a persuasive, exciting tone (Style) for tech-savvy millennials (Personalization). Include a call-to-action and 3 bullet points of key features (Extras)."

The better your prompts, the better AI works for you!

exercises.promptTemplate: You are an expert [___]. Write a product description for the new XPhone Pro that is under 150 words, in an exciting tone, for tech enthusiasts. Include key specs and a call-to-action.
exercises.aiResponse:

lessons.title: What is Midjourney?
lessons.subtitle: Introduction to AI Image Generation
lessons.content:
Welcome to the world of AI art! Midjourney is one of the most powerful AI image generators available today.

**What can Midjourney do?**

Midjourney turns your text descriptions into stunning images. Just type what you want to see, and the AI creates it for you ‚Äî no artistic skills needed!

**Popular uses:**
‚Ä¢ Social media graphics
‚Ä¢ Marketing materials
‚Ä¢ Concept art
‚Ä¢ Logo inspiration
‚Ä¢ Book covers
‚Ä¢ Personal art projects

**How it works:**
You write a "prompt" (a text description), and Midjourney generates 4 image variations based on your description. You can then upscale your favorites or generate more variations.

exercises.scenario: You want to create a professional-looking logo concept for a coffee shop.
exercises.promptTemplate: A minimalist [___] for a coffee shop called 'Bean & Brew', warm colors, clean design, vector style --v 6
exercises.aiResponse: [Midjourney would generate 4 stunning logo variations featuring warm-toned, minimalist designs for 'Bean & Brew' with coffee-related imagery]

prompt.name: Logo Concept
prompt.template: A minimalist [style] for [business] called '[name]', [color scheme], [design style] --v 6

lessons.subtitle: Let AI Create Designs for You
lessons.content:
Canva AI has revolutionized graphic design! With its Magic Design features, anyone can create professional-looking graphics in seconds.

**Key Canva AI features:**

‚Ä¢ **Magic Design**: Describe what you want, and Canva creates it
‚Ä¢ **Magic Write**: AI-powered text generation within your designs
‚Ä¢ **Background Remover**: One-click background removal
‚Ä¢ **Magic Eraser**: Remove unwanted objects from photos
‚Ä¢ **Text to Image**: Generate custom images from descriptions

Canva AI is perfect for beginners because it combines AI power with easy drag-and-drop editing.

**Best uses for Claude:**

‚Ä¢ Long-form writing
‚Ä¢ Code review and debugging
‚Ä¢ Document summarization
‚Ä¢ Brainstorming and ideation

lessons.title: What is Gemini?
lessons.subtitle: Google's Most Capable AI
lessons.content:
Gemini is Google's most advanced AI model. What makes it unique is that it's "multimodal" ‚Äî it can understand text, images, audio, video, and code all at once!

**Gemini's superpowers:**

‚Ä¢ Analyze images and photos
‚Ä¢ Understand and generate code
‚Ä¢ Process audio and video
‚Ä¢ Search the web in real-time
‚Ä¢ Integrate with Google services (Gmail, Docs, etc.)

**Best uses for Gemini:**
‚Ä¢ Photo analysis and description
‚Ä¢ Research with real-time web access
‚Ä¢ Integration with Google Workspace
‚Ä¢ Code generation and debugging
‚Ä¢ Multi-step reasoning tasks
